    • Method Detail

      • findAllCoupledEmployees

        public java.util.ArrayList<Employee> findAllCoupledEmployees(int orderId)
        This method selects all coupled employees based on order ID.
        Parameters:
        orderId - The order id that is coupled to an employee.
        Returns:
        ArrayList with comployees, coupled to a dish.

      • findAllEmployees

        public java.util.ArrayList<Employee> findAllEmployees()
        This method finds all kitchen employees.
        Returns:
        ArrayList with kitchen employees.

      • findAllOrders

        public java.util.ArrayList<Order> findAllOrders()
        This method finds all order that have to be cooked.
        Returns:
        ArrayList that contains all orders that haven't been prepared yet.

      • findOrderDetails

        public java.util.ArrayList<OrderDetail> findOrderDetails(int orderId)
        This method finds all order details on a certain order based on order ID.
        Parameters:
        orderId - Order id that has orders with details.
        Returns:
        ArrayList with orderdetails, based on orderID.

      • updateCoupledOrders

        public void updateCoupledOrders(int employeeId,
                                int orderId,
                                int productId)
        This method updates an order with an employee id, so they are coupled.
        Parameters:
        employeeId - The employee ID that has to make the dish.
        orderId - The order ID of the order that needs an employee.
        productId - The product ID of the product that has to get made.

      • updateAcceptionStatus

        public void updateAcceptionStatus(int orderId,
                                  java.lang.String status)
        This method updates the acception status of an order.
        Parameters:
        orderId - The order ID that has to be updated.
        status - The status of the order.

      • updateDeliveryStatus

        public void updateDeliveryStatus(int orderId)
        This method updates the status of the delivery based on Order ID.
        Parameters:
        orderId - The order that has to be deliverd.
